sub_title: Country Desk Officer for Greece, Cyprus and Malta
summary:
Three key words: Spontaneous, inquisitive and present.

I am interested in international public affairs, Politics, the European Union and Cross Border Cooperation

One of my main questions regarding the EU and its future is how to get the EU closer to its citizens? In my opinion the EU may show more presence in the daily life of citizens and show and tell what they do for them. Reaching out at a local level may be one of the solutions to get closer to the citizens for example in the border regions of Europe the EU really does make a difference.

As a graduate of European Governance at Utrecht University (MSc), I am more than happy to extent my Network.
